TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_block
TABLE.COMMENT: An individual block instance added by a teacher

FIELD.NAME: teacherid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the teacher this configuration is associated with

FIELD.NAME: dateadded
FIELD.COMMENT: The date and time this block was added.

KEY.NAME: teacherid
KEY.COMMENT: The teacher these settings belong to

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_course
TABLE.COMMENT: A registered course for a given block.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of this course.

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of this course.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: The shortname of this course.

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_category
TABLE.COMMENT: A risk category, consisting of one or more rules

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the category

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the category

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course this category belongs to

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this category was created

KEY.NAME: courseid
KEY.COMMENT: The id of the course this category belongs to

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_rule_risk
TABLE.COMMENT: A risk instance - representing a student's score for a rule

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The student associated with this risk instance

FIELD.NAME: ruleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The rule this risk instance corresponds to

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The value represents the level of risk - 0 to 100. For binary rules, risk will be either 0 or 100, otherwise it can step up in increments

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: When this risk instance was generated

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The student this risk is associated with

KEY.NAME: ruleid
KEY.COMMENT: The rule this risk instance is associated with

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_cat_risk
TABLE.COMMENT: An overall risk rating for a student in a given category

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The student this risk instance is associated with

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The category this risk rating is associated with

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The rating of the risk - between 0 and 100.

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Time last updated

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_rule_inst
TABLE.COMMENT: An instance of a rule type, associated with a category

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the rule

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the rule.

FIELD.NAME: weighting
FIELD.COMMENT: Weighting of this rule, relative to sum of weighting for all rules in a category

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this rule was created

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Any value required by the rule (such as student has not logged in for x days)

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The category this rule belongs to

FIELD.NAME: ruletype
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of rule: 1 = default, 2 = custom

FIELD.NAME: custruleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the custom rule this rule is an instance of. If ruletype=2, this ruleid will reference the block_risk_monitor_cust_rule table.

FIELD.NAME: defaultruleid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is references the id of the rule in the rule.php file.

KEY.NAME: categoryid
KEY.COMMENT: The category this rule belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the rule

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the rule

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Creator of this rule.

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: When this rule type was created

FIELD.NAME: min_score
FIELD.COMMENT: Minimum raw score obtainable for this rule

FIELD.NAME: max_score
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum raw score obtainable for this rule

FIELD.NAME: low_mod_risk_cutoff
FIELD.COMMENT: The raw score at which the range reaches moderate risk

FIELD.NAME: mod_high_risk_cutoff
FIELD.COMMENT: The raw score at which the range reaches high risk

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_question
TABLE.COMMENT: A question created by teachers to ask students for subjective rules

FIELD.NAME: question
FIELD.COMMENT: The question text itself

FIELD.NAME: custruleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the custom rule this question belongs to

KEY.NAME: custruleid
KEY.COMMENT: The id of the custom rule this question corresponds to

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_option
TABLE.COMMENT: An option associated with a question

FIELD.NAME: label
FIELD.COMMENT: The option text to be displayed

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The value of this option (0 to 100)

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the question this option is associated with

KEY.NAME: questionid
KEY.COMMENT: The id of the question this option is associated with

TABLE.NAME: block_risk_monitor_answer
TABLE.COMMENT: Student's submissions in response to questions.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question this answer corresponds to

FIELD.NAME: optionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The option selected.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the student who submitted this answer

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: When this answer was submitted

KEY.NAME: questionid
KEY.COMMENT: The question this answer is assoc with

KEY.NAME: optionid
KEY.COMMENT: The option selected by the student

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The user who submitted this answer

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the intervention

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Short description of the intervention

FIELD.NAME: instructions
FIELD.COMMENT: Instructions to the student.

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: A URL uploaded to this template

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: When this template was last altered

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who created this template, so it can be used across their courses

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The category this intervention belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course this intervention was created for, to make it available to other teachers of the course

FIELD.NAME: has_files
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether any files are associated with this template, 1 = yes 0 = no.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The title that will appear to students.

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: The context id the files were added under, for accessing later

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The creator of this intervention template

KEY.NAME: categoryid
KEY.COMMENT: The category this intervention belongs to

KEY.NAME: courseid
KEY.COMMENT: The course context this intervention was made within

KEY.NAME: contextid
KEY.COMMENT: The context that the files for this intervention were uploaded under, for later access
